pullRequest.title: Common dev mode launcher API for Maven and Gradle
pullRequest.bodyText: Originally I was looking into adding support for watching the Gradle build scripts (as we do for the POM files) in dev mode but stumbled on process management in Gradle. However, I thought until I figure that out this common dev mode launcher helper may already make sense on its own.
